title: Boy shot while helping mom with groceries in NE Columbus
content:
COLUMBUS (WCMH) — A teen was shot in the shoulder while helping his mother put away groceries, according to police.
Columbus police responded to reports of a shooting in the 1300 block of East 5th Ave. just after 6pm Friday. Shots were fired from the rear alley into the home.
Police said the 15-year-old boy, who was shot once, was taken to the hospital in stable condition.
Anyone with information about this incident is asked to call the Columbus Police Assault Unit at 614-645-4141 or Central Ohio Crime Stoppers at 614-461-8477.
